bibl.title: Studies in the Genesis and Early Development of the Caliphal Taxation System. With special references to circumstances in the Arab Peninsula, Egypt and Palestine. Avec résumé en danois.
bibl.note: See Part Two, pp. 77-131: deals with the caliphal taxation systems in Egypt and Palestine in the late 7th and early 8th centuries (including evidence from Greek papyri).
bibl.seg: Baek Simonsen Jørgen, Studies in the Genesis and Early Development of the Caliphal Taxation System. With special references to circumstances in the Arab Peninsula, Egypt and Palestine. Avec résumé en danois.
See Part Two, pp. 77-131: deals with the caliphal taxation systems in Egypt and Palestine in the late 7th and early 8th centuries (including evidence from Greek papyri).
